p: Twelve plant species from ten genus and eight families were identified in our study, eight forbs, four grasses. Only two species ( Xanthium strumarium and Chenopodium album) occurred in all four locations, with three species ( Artemisia annua, Setaria feberi, and Setaria viridis) in three locations, two in two locations, and five in only one location (S1 Table in S1 File).
